issue.title: Unable to use a virtualservice WMS as perimeter in SHOP
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Unable to use a virtualservice WMS as perimeter in SHOP.
Services URL building for perimeters do not use "url" or "reflected_url" in components\com_easysdi_shop\libraries\easysdi\sdiPerimeter.php

**Fixed versions :** 4.2.0
